He grows peas, beans, carrots, onions, and other produce typical of this area. Hugo also works for a flower company. He says  both occupations allow him to take care of the family expenses.   
	
He is going to use the loan to invest in labor, fertilizer, and fungicides to take care of his crops.
Hugo wishes to improve his sown fields to be able to get ahead, so his son can get a professional degree.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and fungicides.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca  de 44 años de edad, es una persona con excelentes principios y valores, los que la han llevado a ser una mujer muy reconocida en su comunidad, ella se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar también se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos de engorde. Francisca vivió y se  creció junto a sus padres quienes eran personas muy humildes y trabajadoras que también se dedicaban a la venta de pollos y huevos ya que trabajaban en una granja propia de gallinas ponedoras;  su familia contaba con 3 hermanos siendo ella la mayor de todos a quien le correspondía ayudar en los quehaceres del hogar y en la granja, por ese motivo se le hizo difícil completar sus estudios de educación básica alcanzando únicamente hasta el tercer grado. Ella es madre de 2 hijos, se encuentran estudiando en la escuela de su comunidad, siendo esta la familia de la señora Francisca. 

La señora se dedica a los oficios domésticos de su hogar, con una experiencia de 31 años,  actividad que aprendió de sus padres y también se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y a la venta de huevos ya que posee una granja de 50 gallinas ponedoras y 50 pollos de engorde realizando estas actividades lleva más de 10 años y continuara haciéndolo ya que se ha convertido en su principal fuente de ingresos de donde les proporciona ganancias para satisfacer las necesidades básicas de sus hijos, a esta actividad se suma su esposo y lo hace por las tardes ya que las mañanas las dedica a los trabajos de la agricultura.

El dinero será utilizado en compra de pollos y gallinas ponedoras,  ya que las que se han agotado las existencias y tendrá que comprar más gallinas y pollos y también  una parte del dinero será invertido en mejoramiento de una parta de la granja y en compra de concentrado para aves.

Los sueños que ella tiene para un futuro,  son las de tener una granja  con las mejores instalaciones, y adquirir un nuevo crédito para la compra de una incubadora de esta forma tendrá mejores ingresos económicos, y apoyar la educación de sus hijos hasta que sean unos profesionales de éxito ya que manifiesta que uno de ellos quiere se doctor veterinario.
texts.en:
Francisca, 44, is a person with strong principles and values. She is a very well-known woman in her community. She dedicates herself to domestic chores in her home and she also raises and sells chickens. Francisca was raised by parents who were very humble people. They were workers who were also engaged in the sale of chickens and eggs on their own farm. She had three siblings and she is the oldest of them all. She helped with chores on the farm and, for that reason, found it difficult to complete her basic education and only studied to the third grade. She is the mother of 2 children who study in the community's school. They are Francisca's family.

She works on her household chores around her home. For 31 years she has raised chickens and sold eggs, after she was taught this work by her parents. She owns a farm of 50 laying hens and 50 broiler chickens. She has been doing this work on her own for more than 10 years and she continues because it is her primary source of income to meet the basic needs of her children. Her husband also does this work in the evenings after working in agriculture in the mornings. 

The loan will be used to purchase chickens and laying hens because their flock is lacking and they need more hens and chickens. Some of the money will be invested in improving the farm and buying concentrated feed.
The dreams she has for the future include having a farm with the best facilities and getting a loan to purchase an incubator to provide a better income and support the education of her children until they are successful professionals. One of them wants to be a veterinary doctor.

loans.use: to expand her flock of chickens, fix her farm, and buy feed for her chickens

loans.name: Marigrace

texts.en: Marigrace is 31 years old and married with a child. Her family lives at Cataggaman Pardo. She is a hog raiser and her spouse is a tricycle driver. Their income goes for meals, bills at home and education expenses. She wants to increase their income, which is why she is now asking for additional capital of PHP 7,000 to buy gasoline and oil to use in her spouse’s transport business. She hopes to continue gaining good profits in their businesses and save funds for her family’s future expenses.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and oil for her motorcycle

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Melinda works hard to support her family.

She has a raising of pigs business in the Philippines and earns additional income from her general store.  Melinda is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs. 

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Melinda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 21 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Elsie

texts.en:
Elsie is 33 years old with a live-in partner and seven children. With four of her children currently in school, Elsie works very hard to provide for them.

Elsie's business and family home was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. Elsie has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Elsie has taken a PHP 7,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase materials to rebuild her family home.

She is using this loan to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor.

Elsie is committed to rebuilding her devastated life and in the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Luis Fernando

texts.es:
Luis es un joven de 20 años con mentalidad emprendedora y muchos sueños por cumplir.
Es muy disciplinado y le gustan las ideas frescas y novedosas.
Está iniciando un pequeño negocio de venta de mercancía como ropa, artículos de belleza y para el hogar al por menor aprovechando la experiencia adquirida trabajando como comisionista en el Centro De La Moda en Itagüí, Antioquia.
Es un hombre soltero y con muchas aspiraciones para su futuro. 
Solicita un auxilio económico para comprar y abastecerse de este tipo de mercancía, así podrá aumentar su inventario de productos y tendrá siempre los artículos disponibles para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Luis is a 20 year old with an entrepreneurial mindset and many dreams to fulfill. He is very disciplined and likes fresh and innovative ideas. 

He is starting a small business selling wholesale merchandise such as clothing, beauty products and home products, utilizing his experience working as a commission agent in the Fashion Center in Itagüí, Antioquia. He is single and has many aspirations for his future. 

He is requesting a loan to buy and stock up on this type of merchandise, so he can increase his inventory of products and always have items available for his customers.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothing, beauty items and home products to sell.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Khalida was born in 1976. She is married and a mother of three daughters and one son. Her husband is a retired man whose pension isn't enough to cover his children's needs. For that reason, Khalida has been selling blankets and clothes at her house for two years. She is now seeking to expand her business by purchasing a larger quantity of clothes and blankets. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more blankets and clothes for her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials for his home

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon, a married woman blessed with one school-going child, lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and rental bills.

Sharon operates a charcoal business, selling from home to her neighbours and villagers. Her greatest monthly challenge is the high cost of transportation.

Sharon is requesting this loan to purchase more charcoal for resale. She joined Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for resale

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.es:
La socia Alejandrina continua dedicándose al negocio de crianza de animales menores como pollos y cuyes, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos  a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma segur apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member, Alejandrina , keeps working raising small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs. 
She raises these small animals to sell them later to her customers. This member has been working in this business for a long time. She is doing well thanks to the effort she puts in her business every day. This member wishes to keep working so she can support her family.

This member is requesting the loan to buy guinea pigs for her business.This member is thankful for the granted loan and she is committed to pay her established fees.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs for her business.

loans.name: Zena

texts.en:
Zena is a single woman with four school-going children. She owns a house that has electricity, but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past five years, Zena has operated a business of selling leso cloth (for women's wraps). She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of expanding to become a big supplier of clothes in the future.

With the loan, Zena wants to purchase pieces of leso to sell. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase pieces of leso (for women's wraps) to sell.

loans.name: Aracely

texts.es:
Una atención de calidad y productos de primera, es lo que ofrece Aracely en su pulpería, todos los clientes quedan satisfechos al realizar sus compras, poco a poco se ha ganado la fidelidad de cada uno. Es una mujer amable y emprendedora, tiene 31 años de edad y está soltera. Desde los 15 años su madre le enseño, a ella y a su hermana, como administrar una pequeña pulpería. El aprendizaje le ha sido útil, siempre estará agradecida con su madre, su negocio es la única fuente de ingresos, por lo que labora con esmero y dedicación.
Ella solicita el crédito para aumentar la producción de su capital, requiere comprar granos básicos, tales como arroz y frijoles; productos lácteos, productos de limpieza, refrescos, entre otros. Deposita su confianza en el financiamiento, puesto que anhela aumentar su clientela para incrementar sus ganancias, y así obtener mejores condiciones de vida. Junto a su hermana, sueñan lograr establecer un mini super, trabajaran hasta lograrlo. Una de las metas de Aracelly es lograr culminar la carrera de contabilidad, quiere realizar cuentas exactas en su negocio.
texts.en:
Attention to the quality of her products - this is what Aracely offers to her customers in her grocery store. All of her customers are satisfied with their purchases.  Little by little she has gained the loyalty of each one.  She is a friendly and enterprising woman. She is 31 years old and is single.  From the time she was 15, her mother taught her and her sister how to run a small grocery store.  This education has been useful, and she will always be grateful to her mother.  Her business is her only source of income, for which she works with great care and dedication.

She is seeking this loan in order to increase her inventory. She needs to purchase staple items such as rice and beans, as well as dairy products, soft drinks, cleaning products and other items.  She is putting her faith in this loan, as she hopes to build her customer base and increase her earnings, therefore improving her quality of life.

Along with her sister, she dreams of being able to establish a mini-supermarket, and they will work until they achieve this.  Another one of her goals is to be able to complete her course in accounting, as she wants to be keep exact records in her business.

loans.use: to purchase staple items such as rice and beans, as well as dairy products, soft drinks, cleaning products and other items.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is a hardworking divorced man living in Kagadi-Uganda. William farms and sells produce to educate his children. He is requesting this loan to buy more produce such as maize to sell.

Williams hopes to grow his business and start up a shop despite the poor roads that make his delivery service difficult.

loans.use: to buy more produce such as maize to sell.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Viviana es una mujer joven con grandes aspiraciones y proyecciones para su futuro.
Tiene una niña de 5 años (Foto) y aunque es madre soltera nunca se ha dejado vencer por las adversidades o por lo difícil que se puedan tornar las circunstancias.
Tiene la idea de montar un almacén de ropa y accesorios para dama y caballero con la motivación de salir adelante y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida y educación a su pequeña hija.
Tiene un poco de experiencia en este campo ya que ha trabajado en otros almacenes pero nunca ha tenido uno propio.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar vitrinas, estanterías y surtido de ropa, de esta forma podrá iniciar con su proyecto y cumplir con su sueño de ser independiente.
Ella desea que con esta nueva etapa pueda conseguir todo lo que ha querido para ella y su hija.
texts.en:
Viviana is a young woman with many hopes and plans for the future. She has a 5-year-old daughter (see photo), and although she is a single mother, she has never yielded to adversities or to the circumstances, however difficult they may have been.

Viviana's plan is to set up a clothes and accessories shop for men and women. Her motivation is to get ahead and to offer her small daughter a better quality of life and an education. She has some experience in this area, because she has worked in various shops, but she has never had her own shop.

She is asking for a loan to buy display cases, shelves, and a range of clothes. With this she could start her project and realize her dream to be independent.

She hopes that in this new period in her life she can get everything she ever wanted for herself and for her daughter.

loans.use: to buy display cases, shelves and a range of clothes and accessories for men and women.

loans.name: Amilcar

texts.es:
Amilcar es una persona de 57 años de edad,  muy responsable, respetuoso y trabajador, él se crecido con su madre que se dedicaba a la crianza y venta de pollos de engorde en una granja propia.  El señor Amilcar realizó sus estudios hasta bachillerato en mecánica automotriz  y se ha dedicado a dicha actividad desde que se graduó del instituto nacional y se ha convertido en principal fuente de ingresos. Además, se dedica a la compra y venta de vehículos.

 Él se levanta a las 5 de la mañana y se dispone a salir a su lugar de trabajo que está ubicado en el barrio que le queda a 5 km de su casa. De esta forma viaja de lunes a sábado a su lugar de trabajo y los fines de semana se dedica a la venta de vehículos.

El señor se dedica a realizar trabajos de mecánica automotriz en un taller que es de su propiedad, y desarrollando esta actividad tiene una experiencia de 30 años actividad que ha sido aprendida fruto de su empeño y el esfuerzo en realizar sus estudios.

El dinero será utilizado en ampliación y mejoramiento del taller,  ya que necesita comprar algunas herramientas de trabajo y algunos insumos de trabajo, también será invertido en la reparación de un vehículo que acaba de comprar y que posteriormente será puesto a la venta a un mejor precio esto le genera ganancias económicas que serán invertidas en compra de un nuevo vehículo para repararlo.

Las proyecciones que el señor tiene a futuro son las de pagar el crédito y adquirir otro para comprar más herramientas de trabajos y prestar un mejor servicio a sus clientes de esta manera tendrá mejores ingresos, también apoyar en el estudio de su nieta que es con quien vive y trabajar fuerte para poner un auto lote.
texts.en:
Amilcar is 57 and is very responsible, respectful and hardworking.  He was raised by his mother, who made her living by selling chickens that she raised on her own farm.  He completed his high school education, specializing in automotive repair.  He has done this type of work since he graduated from the national institute, and it has become his main source of income.  Additionally, he buys and sells vehicles.

He wakes up at five in the morning and travels to his workplace, which is in a neighborhood five kilometers from his home. He does this from Monday through Saturday, and on the weekends he sells vehicles.

He owns his own auto shop, and he has thirty years of experience, which has been gained thanks to his determination and effort in his studies.

The funds will be used in order to improve and expand his shop, since he needs to purchase some tools and supplies.  He will also use the funds to repair a vehicle he just purchased, which he plans to resell at a higher price.  This will generate profits what will be invested in another vehicle that he can repair and resell.

His goal is to pay off his loan, and then acquire another one so that he can purchase more tools and provide enhanced service to his clients.  In this way he will increase his income, and he will be able to support his granddaughter, with whom he lives, in her studies.  He will also work hard in order to open his own parking lot.

loans.use: to improve and expand his shop, since he needs to purchase some tools and supplies.  He will also use the funds to repair a vehicle he just purchased.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
This is Loreta and her cow being photographed in front of the stable! She wants to add another cow, and she is seeking your financial help to make her goal a reality. 

Loreta is 40 years old and married. She is the mother of two children: 20 and 15 years old. Agriculture/livestock is what she has been pursuing from the very beginning as a means for generating an income, just like almost every household in her village. She owns the cow in the photograph. She also plants wheat, fodder, beans and onions; she sells them dried.
 
Loreta’s village is an old village built in a Gothic style. It is similar to Italian vintage style with cobblestone streets dating back to the 1920s. There are five Orthodox churches. The village draws lots of visitors throughout the year.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: María Saraí

texts.es:
María es una joven muy dinámica de 20 años de edad, a ella le gusta participar en todos los eventos de la comunidad, ya piensa en un futuro hogar, es una persona muy respetuosa con las demás, eso la a llevado a que las personas le guarden ese carisma y aprecio.

 Ella aun con vive con sus padres, es muy reconocida por su forma de relacionarse con los demás. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de productos de cosmetología., ella estudio hasta octavo grado en una escuela del lugar de residencia. Siempre fue muy reconocida por sus aspiraciones de sobresalir y ser alguien en la vida con el dinero que obtiene de las ganancias ayuda a sus padres en la compra de medicamentos, así como en el sostén de comida y otras necesidades de su familia 

María tiene un negocio de venta de productos de cosmetología, trabajo que lo aprendió con una de sus amigas quien le enseño como distribuir los productos a orden de catálogo. De esta forma continuo trabajando y motivada por los ingresos económicos. 

El préstamo será utilizado en la compra de productos para la cosmetología, como cosméticos, shampoo, acondicionador, tintes, pinta uñas, cremas, etc. , manifiesta que cada día la demanda crece  y las personas le encargan nuevos productos, esto le permitiría que venda otros productos, esto traerá mejores ingreso para ella y la de su familia, también desea que su negocio que está ubicado en su casa pueda ir creciendo, esto suplirá la necesidad básicas.  

Los sueños son que su negocio crezca  día con día y ofrecerle el producto que las personas necesitan, ella piensa que cuando se case tener una familia muy organizada con muy buenos ingreso económicos.
texts.en:
Maria, 20, is a very dynamic young woman. She enjoys participating in community events and is already thinking about a future home. She is very respectful of other people and people like her charisma and appreciate her. Maria is still living with her parents. She studied until 8th grade at a local school and was always recognized for her aspirations to get ahead and be someone in life. With the profit from her sales, she helps her parents purchase medicine as well as food and other family necessities.
Maria has a business selling cosmetics. She learned the trade from a friend who taught her how to distribute products under catalog sales. She then kept working, encouraged by the income.
The loan will be invested in the purchase of products such as cosmetics, shampoo, hair conditioner, hair dyes, nail polish, creams, etc. She explains that demand increases every day and people are ordering new products. Selling more products will provide increased income for her and her family. She also hopes that her business, located at her home, grows so that it can cover basic needs.
Her dreams are for her business to grow day by day and to be able to offer the right products to people demanding them. When she marries, Maria hopes to have a well organized family, with good income.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, shampoo, hair conditioner, hair dyes, nail polish, creams, etc.

loans.name: Visitación

texts.es:
Visitación de 58 Años de edad, es un agricultor de la zona, el cual se ha dedicado a la siembra de granos básicos y sandias las cuales vende su esposa, ella tiene un cafetín en la carretera en donde vende refrescos, boquitas y la deliciosa sandia, para todos los viajeros que pasan por la calzada.

Visitación también vende carnes frescas y saladas y destaza reces y cerdos actividad con la cual ha logrado llevar el sustento a su familia. Cultivando la tierra de la cual pródigamente obtiene sus frutos para después consumirlos y vender parte de ellos para de esos obtener ganancias.  

El préstamo se empleara para el cultivo de sandias de la temporada y la compra de carne para la venta de este modo incrementar su producción y ventas. manifiesta Visitación que esta temporada espera  mejorar su producción y sus ventas ya que en años anteriores al no tener un apoyo financiero no lo había logrado. 

 Visitación comenta que su plan a largo plazo es mejorar su cafetín y sus ventas, ya que tiene un fuerte potencial.
texts.en:
Visitacion, 58, is a local farmer. He grows basic grains and watermelons, which his wife sells. She owns a small cafe on the side of the road where she sells soft-drinks, snacks and the tasty watermelons to people traveling on the road.
Visitacion also sells fresh and cured meat and he butchers cattle and pigs. This activity provides sustenance for the family. He also grows his land, which provides plenty of fruit for personal consumption and to sell for an additional profit.
The loan will be used to grow seasonal watermelons and to purchase meat for reselling, in order to increase production and income. Visitacion hopes to increase production and sales this season, which he hadn't managed in previous years due to lack of financial support. His long term goal is to make improvements to the cafe and increase sales because it has a lot of potential.

loans.use: to grow watermelons and to buy meat for resale.

loans.name: Gloria Cecilia

texts.es:
Gloria es una mujer de experiencia, sabiduría y mucha paciencia.
Es madre de 3 hijos y ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para sacarlos adelante.
Ella tiene una pequeña chaza en la que vende frituras, golosinas y refrescos, adicional a esto trabaja en producción y venta de arepas que ella misma prepara en su casa. Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 11:00 Am para tener su producto listo y fresco para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.
Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y tener un gran avance de insumos e inventario de productos, por eso acude a un préstamo para comprar surtido de bebidas y frituras, además desea comprar insumos para su producción de arepas caseras.
Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda y buen corazón de las personas para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Gloria is an experienced, wise and very patient woman.  She is a mother of three children, and she has worked for practically her entire life in order to provide them with a better standard of living.

She has a small stand from which she sells fried foods, candies and soft drinks.  In addition, she also sells corn pancakes, which she makes herself in her home.  She works every day from 5:00 am  to 11:00 am to get her products ready so that they are fresh for her customers, the majority of whom live in the neighborhood.

She wishes to stock her business and have a large inventory of products and supplies.  For this reason she seeking a loan in order to purchase sodas and fried foods for resale, and to purchase supplies for her production of corn pancakes.

One of her main difficulties is the lack of funds to invest in her business, but she trusts in the help and the good heart of other people in order to move her business forward.

loans.use: to purchase sodas and fried foods for resale, and to purchase supplies for her production of corn pancakes.

loans.name: Moon Group

texts.en:
Amal is the featured representative of the Moon group. She and the other members of this group loan are best friends, and they’ve acquired a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua so that they can all make improvements to their livelihoods together.

Amal is a 49-year-old single woman who is financially responsible for three other members of her family. She first started working in a clothing store, but she has since decided to follow her passion as a hair stylist and has been working in a salon for the last five years.

This is Amal’s second time borrowing, and she is using this loan to purchase the necessary equipment to open her own salon from home. Owning her own salon will provide Amal with the financial stability and independence she needs to adequately provide for her family.

Amal is the first lady at the right side of the picture, Farah is the second member of the group and she is sitting in the middle with eyeglasses, while Ghazal is on her left side.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary equipment to open her own salon from home.

loans.name: Donia Al- Yemen Group

texts.en:
This group is called Donia Al- Yemen. It consists of four ladies who live in Hodeidah, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 140,000 YER from AMB.

Arwa is a hardworking woman. She is a 27-year-old single woman and lives with her family in a poor area in Hodeidah. She is the leader of the group. Arwa's mother passed away several years ago. The mother worked sewing clothes for women in her area. The income from this business was good. After her mother passed away, Arwa decided to work in this business in order to help her father with the household expenses. She started as a dressmaker with capital from her mother. She runs her business easily because she got good experience working with her mother. Unfortunately, the income of this business is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family, and she wants to improve it. For this reason, Arwa applied for a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more women's clothes to sew and resell to her customers.

Arwa looks forward to expanding her business in order to provide her family with a lot of money.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothes to sew and resell

loans.name: 6 De Mayo Ii Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “6 DE MAYO II” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Beatriz es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, pintado de letreros, pollos a la broster, tejido de gorras, medicina natural, venta de cosméticos, venta de pescado, venta de medicina natural.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Beatriz es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de pintado de letreros; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su esposo, ya que cuando se casaron él ya había contaba con su propio taller, posteriormente decide independizarse y contar con un negocio independiente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de pinturas por mayor) que adquirirá de las comerciantes de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente los instalara en su espacio de venta ya que realiza los trabajos a pedido del cliente. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada  y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros y el área de salud que ofrece la institución y su grupo.

En la imagen una de las socias no esta presente por razones del negocio tuvo que marcharse con premura.
texts.en:
The communal bank "6 de Mayo" is starting their first loan cycle with the field partner, Pro Mujer, as part of the Regional Hub of Collpani. The group is formed by 10 members and is led by a board of directors, where Beatriz is the president. The businesses carried out by the communal bank’s members are varied; among them are a grocery store, sign painting, selling fried chicken, hat knitting, natural medicine, cosmetic sales, fish sales.
The loan that they will take out will benefit small micro-businesswomen, one of whom is Beatriz. She says that this is their first time with Pro Mujer, joining at the invitation of a friend who is a member of the organization. Currently, she has a business painting signs. She learned the trade from her husband. When they married, he already had his own workshop. Beatriz later decided to become independent and have her own business.
The loan that she will take out now is to increase the working capital, purchasing paint wholesale from merchants in the city of La Paz. She will then store them in her selling space, because she works based on customer request. This way of working allows her to generate income to support her family because she is married and has two children.
When asked what she enjoys about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the savings and the health area offered by her institution. In the picture, one of the members is missing because she had to leave early due to work reasons.

loans.use: to buy paint wholesale.

loans.name: San Jeronimo De Surco Group

texts.es: Tarcila tiene 62 años de edad es conviviente con hijos todos independiente. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas palta chirimoya manzana hace 30 años. Y a la vez vende alfalfa. Ella se siente satisfecha de poder participar en una nueva alcancía comunal como es el grupo “SAN JERONIMO DE SURCO”.  Los 08 socios del mencionado grupo agradecen a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito otorgado. Tarcila es la segunda persona parada del lado derecho viste chompa beige.
texts.en:
Tarcila is 62 years old, has a partner and children who are all independent. She has sold avocados, custard apples, and apples for 30 years.  And she also sells alfalfa. She is happy to be able to take part in a new communal bank like the group "SAN JERONIMO DE SURCO". 

The 8 members of this group would like to thank KIVA investors for giving the loan. Tarcila is the second person on the right wearing a beige sweater.

loans.use: to buy more avocados, custard apples, and apples.

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия — предприниматель из Киевской области. Она работает на местном рынке ее родного города Белая Церковь, торгуя женской обувью — от тапочек до сапог. Наталия работает 3-5 дней в неделю. В бизнесе работает уже 20 лет, опыт работы большой. Торговое место на данный момент арендует. 
Сумму в 10 000 гривен Наталия планирует вложить в закупку новой сезонной летней женской обуви, расширив тем самым ассортимент и количество товара.
texts.en:
Nataliya is an entrepreneur from the Kiev region. She works at the local market in her native city of Belaya Tserkov selling women's footwear, from slippers to boots. She works three to five days a week and has a lot of experience, having worked in her business for 20 years. She currently rents her retail space.

Nataliya plans to use the sum of 10,000 grivens to purchase women's footwear for the new season so she can expand her inventory and quantity of goods for sale.

loans.use: to purchase additional summer stock

loans.name: Lucia Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Lucia siendo una persona responsable, honesta y con el propósito de superar, junto a su compañero de vida han salido adelante en su negocio de Pulpería que es su fuente de ingresos, ella es administradora de Empresas, pero la tasa de desempleo en Nicaragua es bastante alta, por lo que se le ha hecho difícil conseguir un trabajo a parte de sus negocio.  Solicita financiamiento para construir un porche en su humilde vivienda,   necesitando comprar los siguientes materiales de Construcción: cerámica, cemento, arena, bloque, hierro, piedrín, porcelana, bondex y pintura, con esto dará mejor comodidad a su familia y por ende su pequeño hijo que ahora tiene 5 años tendrá más espacio en la vivienda.-
texts.en:
Lucia is a responsible and honest person with the intention of succeeding.  Together with her life partner they have gotten ahead in their grocery business, which is their source of income.  She is a business administrator, but the unemployment rate in Nicaragua is pretty high.  Therefore, it has been difficult for her to find work other than with her business.

She is requesting a loan to build a porch on her humble home.  She needs to buy the following construction materials:  tiles, cement, sand, cement blocks, iron, gravel, porcelain, Bondex, and paint.  With this she will make her family more comfortable.  Her small son, who is now five years old, will have more space at home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Fernanda

texts.en:
Fernanda is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Fernanda is 37 years old and has four children who are currently in school.

Fernanda has a fishing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional materials for her business, like fishing net, wood, and bamboo.

Fernanda has been in this business for five years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials for her business, like fishing net, wood, and bamboo.

loans.name: Juana Pastora

texts.es:
Juana de 45 años es reconocida por su derroche de creatividad. Los niños la aman no solo por su buen carácter, también porque desde hace 11 años los hace feliz  elaborando y vendiendo piñatas como ellos deseen. Anteriormente pudo hacer feliz a muchos niños, pues había recibido un préstamo de parte de MiCrédito-KIVA el cual fue bastante aprovechado porque al comprar el papel y la pega que necesitaba, sus ganancias han crecido, lo que le ha permitido salir adelante con su familia y hacerle unas mejoras a su casa.
Al contarnos de su crecimiento, mostrando sus productos, expresa lo agradecida que está con sus préstamos anteriores. En  estos momentos Juana necesita de otro préstamo, el cual lo invertiría en la compra de almidón, periódico, papel crepe, pega y cartulina, pues con todos los materiales necesarios podrá cumplir con todos los pedidos que a diario llegan. Este trabajo quien es apoyado por su hija y su esposo, es lo que hace de Juana una mujer que quiere seguir siendo la pionera en la venta de piñatas. Entre sus metas está seguir mejorando su negocio, construir un cuarto más donde podrá ordenar mejor sus materiales.
texts.en:
Juana, who is 45 years old, is well known for her profuse creativity. Children love her, not only for her great personality, but also because for the past eleven years she has been making them happy by making and selling custom pinatas. She was able to make many children happy with the loan she previously received from MiCrédito-Kiva, which was put to good use, because she was able to buy the paper and glue that she needed. It allowed her earnings to increase, which in turn enabled her to provide for her family and make some home improvements.

In telling us about her growth and showing us her products, she expressed how grateful she is for her previous loans. At this time Juana needs another loan, which she will invest in purchasing starch, newspaper, crepe paper, glue, and card stock. Having all the materials she needs will allow her to fill all the orders she is getting daily. Her daughter and husband help her with her work, which makes Juana want to continue being the pioneer woman of pinata sales. Her goals include continuing to improve her business and building a new room where she will be able to organize her materials better.

loans.use: to buy starch, newspaper, crepe paper, glue, and card stock.

loans.name: Munkhtsetseg

texts.en:
Mrs. Munkhtsetseg, 49 years old, lives with her husband in an old house in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She has been working as a technologist at a cookie factory since 1994. Her husband has retired from work, and sometimes sells handmade canisters to local people. Their two children both got married and live separately. 

She is requesting a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to buy building materials such as bricks, cement, fiberglass and foam for a house renovation. 

The house her family lives in has deteriorated over the years due to heavy snowfall and strong winds. 

After the renovation her family will live in a comfortable and warm place where less coal is burned, and then less pollutants are released into the air.

loans.use: to renovate her house

loans.name: Patricia Lissett

texts.es: Patricia tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos de 7 años y 9 años quienes son su motivación para seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Patricia tiene tiene 6 vacas las cuales le permiten tener el negocio de venta de leche y de esta forma se gana  la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la instalación del servicio de energía eléctrica en su vivienda dado que no cuenta con el servicio y desea dar mejores condiciones de desarrollo a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Patricia, age 34, lives in her own house with her two children, ages seven and nine.  They are her motivation to continue struggling to improve their living conditions.

Patricia has six cows.  This allows her to have a business of selling milk.  This way she earns a living and brings sustenance to her household.

With the desire to improve their living conditions, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI.  She will use the loan to install electricity at her house.  They do not have this service, and she wishes to give her children better conditions for their development.

loans.use: to install electricity at her house.

loans.name: Tillo

texts.ru: Тилло 53-летний житель района Вахш с высшим образованием. Он на протяжении более 10 лет работает экономистом в государственном банке. Параллельно он еще и занимается растениеводством на своем приусадебном участке земли. Тилло женат и имеет шестерых сыновей. Его жена домохозяйка и дома занимается шитьем. Двое его старших сыновей уехали в Россию на заработки. Средний сын Тилло студент. Он учится в Государственном Университете города Кугантюбе в факультете "История и право". Сын Тилло способный молодой человек и в будущем собирается стать хорошим юристом. Тилло обратился за кредитом в организацию Хумо, который предоставляет кредит для образования по более низким процентным ставкам. Тилло хочет оплатить за трехлетнее обучение сына в университете, а также купить ему ноутбук для учебы. Он надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Tillo is a 53-year-old resident of the Vakhsh region. He has a higher education and has been working as an economist in the state bank for more than 10 years. During the same time he has also been raising crops on his personal plot of land. Tillo is married and has six sons. His wife is a homemaker and does sewing at home. His two oldest sons have gone to work in Russia. His third son is a student at Kugantyube State University in the faculty of history and justice. He is a capable young man and is working to become a good lawyer in the future. Tillo has turned to the organization Khumo for a lower-interest educational loan. He wants to pay for his son's third-year university tuition and to buy him a laptop for his studies. He hopes for support.

loans.use: to pay his son's third-year university tuition and buy him a computer

loans.name: Mario Ernesto

texts.es: Mario tiene 22 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 8 meses de edad. Mario se dedica a la prestación de servicios de seguridad en una institución cercana a su localidad. De esta forma mantiene  a su familia puesto que sus esposa se dedica al trabajo de la casa y no recibe ningún ingreso. Mario desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la mejora del piso y de las paredes de su vivienda. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena y grava.
texts.en: Mario, 22, lives in a house he owns together with his life partner and their 8-month old daughter. Mario works as a security officer in an institution close to his locality. That is how he provides for his family. His wife works as a housewife and does not receive any income. Mario wants to improve the conditions of his house and that is why he is asking for a loan from the lending partner, FUSAI, to invest in improvements for the floor and walls of the house. With the loan amount he will buy cement, sand and gravel.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor and whitewash the walls of his house.

loans.name: Naomi

texts.en:
Naomi is a 46-year-old mother from Kisumu region, which is located in the western part of Kenya. She is married to Barack, who is a businessman and supports the family by providing income. She supports three people in their family and has two children who are 22 and four years old, respectively.

Naomi sells cereals and has been operating this business for the last ten years, making a monthly income of KES 8,000. She is taking her fifth loan with VisionFund Kenya, which she will use to purchase more assorted cereals to sell. She will use the anticipated profit to expand her business.

Naomi's dream is to expand her business and support the family.

loans.use: to purchase assorted cereals.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Being a hardworking mother, Gloria aims to improve her small retail store to increase her income. She is 59 years old and has two adult-aged children.

Despite of being a widow, she has the determination to uplift her status of living. 

She wants to avail a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy junk food, soft drinks, canned goods, laundry soaps, noodles, beverages and seasonings to sell in the local community. 

She believes this financial assistance will further improve the business and make it more profitable in the future.

loans.use: to buy junk food, soft drinks, canned goods, laundry soaps, noodles, beverages and seasonings to sell

location.town: Brgy. Malasin, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 57 years old, married, and had 11 children. Three of them are studying, while the rest are already married. 

The family’s income comes from a furniture-making business. She used her income for meals and bills at home. 

She wanted to meet their customers demand for high quality output, and she needs additional capital of P8,000 to buy more wood to make and improve their output of tables and chairs. 

She hopes to make their business profitable and to someday achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy more wood to use in the furniture-making business

loans.name: Emelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of two children, Emelyn works hard to support her family.

Emelyn has a buy and sell fish business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport. Emelyn is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell in her buy and sell fish business.

Emelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her to attain her dream, which is to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is 43 years old and has four children who are currently in school. Flora also has a live-in partner with five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Flora's house was destroyed by Super Typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines last November 8, 2013. She has restarted her business and is committed to regain what she lost. Flora is taking out a PHP 3,000 housing loan through NWTF to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor to build a house for her family.

Flora has been with NWTF since 2012 in her pursuit to rise out of poverty. With your help, she will be able to start once more in a new home. In the future, Flora would like to save enough money so that she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Faustine

texts.en:
Faustine is a 41-year-old hardworking married woman living in Kagadi-Uganda. She has four children, ages 16 to 10, and all attend school. 

She has been a teacher for 20 years, and she also earns an income from farming. She is challenged by low and delayed salary payments. Her vision is to see her children go to school to a level of self dependency. 

Faustine is requesting a loan to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Catherine

texts.en:
Catherine is a married mother of two school going children. She lives in her own house that has both electricity and piped water.

Catherine makes soft drinks and ice cubes using fruits and juice flavours, selling them to her neighbours and passersby. She cites seasonality as her major challenge.

With the loan she is requesting, Catherine wants to purchase juice flavours and fruits for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase juice flavours and fruits for her business

loans.name: Garik

texts.en:
Garik lives with his wife and two little girls, ages 5 and 2.

Garik is a fireman and works at a rescue service of Gyumri town. He also studies at the university, where he is a fifth year student. 

The reason Garik applied for this loan is his university tuition. His salary allows him to cover household costs, but is not enough to save for his education. So this requested loan is very important for Garik to pay for his university tuition and complete his education.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Wilver Antonio

texts.es:
Wilver de 37 años de edad, tuvo el apoyo de sus padres, y logro finalizar el bachillerato. Actualmente esta soltero y no tiene hijos, en casa solo vive con su madre y su hermana, puesto que su padre hace varios años fallecio. El se ha dedicado a la agricultura, desde los 14 años, ya que su padre, lo llevaba a trabajar a las algodoneras y milpas cuando el no asistía a la escuela; así fue, que el empezó a conocer de los  trabajos y necesidades que el cultivo de maíz necesita. 

El terreno el cual cultiva, esta a 50 mts. de su casa, recibe la ayuda de un tío para realizar los trabajos que el cultivo necesita. Wilver es una persona emprendedora y con deseos de superarse, y es por eso; que cuando no esta trabajando en la milpa, el se dedica a vender medicinas, y lo hace visitando a los clientes, casa por casa. Esto lo hace, para no depender directamente de la producción de maíz, ya que hay épocas en las que pueden ocurrir perdidas en el cultivo y por ende sus ingresos se ven disminuidos grandemente.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar los insumos agrícolas para sembrar una hectarea de maíz. Con el financiamiento se le ayudar a el a que su cultivo se desarrolle en optimas condiciones, y así que la producción sea rentable y se generen buenos ingresos.

Las perspectivas que hay, son de seguir trabajando, para asegurar la alimentación de el  y su familia, también quisiera construir su casa.
texts.en:
Wilver is 37 years old and his parent’s support and managed to finish high school.  He is currently single and has no children.  Only his mother and his sister live with him because his father passed away several years ago.  He has been a farmer since age 14 since his father used to take him to work in the cotton and cornfields when he was not in school.  This is how he learned this this type of work and the requirements of raising corn.

The land he works is 50m from his house and he gets help from his uncle.  Wilver is an enterprising person with a desire to get ahead, so when he is not working in the fields he sells medicines door to door.  He does this so that he doesn’t have to depend solely on the corn production because there are times when he can lose some of his crops and his income drops gradually.

He will use the money from this loan to buy farming supplies to plant a hectare of corn.  This loan will help him develop his crops under optimal conditions so that his crops will be profitable and will generate a good income.

He wants to continue working to ensure that his family is fed.  He also wants to build a house.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Rufino Alexander

texts.es:
Rufino de 25 Años de edad. Es un agricultor humilde de la zona,  el cual cada día a levantarse da gracias a Dios por todo y se encamina a su parcela para trabajar duro la tierra, comenta que sus tres pequeños el mayor aveces le colabora en los trabajos de labranza de la tierra, con mucho esmero  al rallar el sol su esposa, se levanta a prepararle un café para que él con entusiasmo se encamine a su labor del día juntos están luchando con muchas ganas para lograr sus objetivos;  comenta Rufino las faenas en el campo son duras pero a él le gusta tanto recoger de la tierra sus frutos con su esfuerzo sabe que saldrá adelante con su familia. 

Él Trabaja la tierra desde que tenia 10 años de edad y siempre a luchado con ganas para obtener frutos, su padre le enseño el trabajo y  recuerda que cuando cumplió 10 años su padre le dijo “  a trabajar la tierra se ha dicho porque esto es lo que te toca”.  


El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para comprar semilla, pesticidas, herbicidas, fertilizantes, para cultivar maíz y frijol,  pagara también jornaleros los cuales le ayudaran con los trabajos de preparación de la tierra y la siembra y la recolección de la cosecha.


 Rufino pretende incrementar sus ingresos por la venta de cosecha y mejorar su calidad de vida ya que con el apoyo de prestamos como este la gente sale adelante luchando con el firme deseo de superar la pobreza.
texts.en:
Rufino is 25 years old. He is a humble local farmer who gives thanks to God for everything each morning when he gets up to go to his plot of land for another day's hard work and dedication. As soon as the sun starts to rise, his wife gets up to make him some coffee for him to head out to work with enthusiasm. Together they are striving and fighting for their goals to be met. Rufino says that farmwork is hard but that he loves harvesting the fruit of the land and knows that his effort will allow his family to get ahead.

He has been farming since he was ten years old and has always strived to obtain results. He learned this work from his father and remembers that when he turned ten, his father told him, "It's time to work the land, because this is your lot." 

He will use the loan he is requesting from CrediCampo to buy seeds, pesticides, herbicides, and fertilizer in order to grow corn and beans. He will also pay the laborers that will help him prepare the land, plant the crops, and harvest.

Rufino intends to increase his income by selling what he harvests and to improve his quality of life, because loans like this give people with the firm desire of overcoming poverty the support they need in order to keep fighting and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides, herbicides, and fertilizer, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa de 28 Años de edad, es una joven la ultima hembra de su familia de 8 hermanos, comenta que a sus 18 años decidió formar su hogar con un joven de la localidad con el cual procreo 2 pequeñas niñas, emigra a los Estados Unidos y luego de eso sus destinos tomaron rumbos diferentes antes de que él se marchase ella hacia pupusas y vendía los domingos y los jueves y después que él se marcho ella continuo con la actividad y así logro crecer a sus pequeñas y actualmente continua haciéndolo pues con esto contribuye para apoyar a su familia pero desea potenciar esta actividad para mejorar sus ingresos, sus pequeñas la apoyan en lo que pueden y ella se siente muy orgullosa de ello, “mis hijas son mi tesoro y mi mayor regalo” expreso. 


 Su madre le enseño a preparar las ricas pupusas que hoy ella prepara para los encuentros deportivos que se realizan en la comunidad todos los domingos y los entrenamientos del equipo el día jueves, así pues comenta lucha cada día para mejorar y salir adelante a pesar de todas las dificultades de la vida, sabe que si se propone algo no hay nada que la detenga.  


El préstamo se empleara para la compra de otra plancha para pupusas,  ya que tiene una persona que le apoya con esta actividad y es muy necesaria la otra plancha ya que no se da abasto con la que tienen debido a que es muy pequeña, con el resto de dinero comprara los ingredientes para la elaboración de las ricas pupusas.


Ella planea en un futuro incrementar sus ventas y sobre todo tener su pupuseria en donde pueda vender todas las tardes las ricas pupusas con las cuales deleitar el paladar de quienes las prueben.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 28, is a young woman who is the last girl in her family of eight siblings.  She says that when she was 18 she decided to form a household with a young man from the area.  They had two daughters, and he emigrated to the United States.  After this, their destinies took different routes.

Before he left she made ‘pupusas’ [stuffed tortillas] and sold them on Sundays and Thursdays.  After he left, she continued with this business activity.  This way she managed to raise her little ones, and she continues doing so.  With this she contributes to help her family, but she wishes to boost this business activity in order to improve her income.  Her little ones help her in what they can, and she is very proud of that.  “My daughters are my treasure and my greatest gift,” she says.

Her mother taught her how to prepare the delicious pupusas that she now makes for sports gatherings in the community every Sunday.  She also makes them for the team practices on Thursdays.  She says that this is the way that she struggles every day to improve and to get ahead in spite of life’s difficulties.  She knows that if she sets her mind to something, there is nothing that can stop her.

She will use the loan to buy another griddle for the pupusas.  She has one person who helps her with this business activity, and she really needs another griddle.  The one that she has is very small, and it just is not big enough.  She will use the rest of the money to buy ingredients to make the delicious pupusas.

In the future she plans to increase her sales.  She plans to have a pupusa stand where she is able to sell the delicious pupusas every afternoon.  The pupusas please the palates of all who try them.

loans.use: to buy another griddle.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana tiene 26 años de edad, es soltera, vive en el municipio de Santo Tomás La Unión, departamento de Suchitepéquez, obtiene sus ingresos preparando refacción para los niños de la escuela de la comunidad donde vive, tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esta actividad, Ana le gusta que las personas sepan leer y escribir por eso trabaja por las tardes alfabetizando a las persona que tuvieron la oportunidad de asistir a la escuela, Ana solicita un crédito por un monto de Q. 3,500.00 para comprar una refrigeradora, el sueño de Ana es tener una casa en mejores condiciones para vivir más cómodo.
texts.en:
Ana is 26 years old, single, and lives in the town of Santo Tomás La Unión, in the department of Suchitepéquez. She earns money preparing snacks for the school children in the community where she lives. She's been working in this occupation for 5 years. Ana likes people to know how to read and write, and because of that she works in the afternoon teaching the people that have the opportunity to attend school, to read and write. 

Ana is asking for a loan of Q. 3,500.00 to buy a refrigerator. Her dream is to have a house in better conditions to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator

loans.name: Mavjuda

texts.ru: Мавчуда 34 летняя жительница маленького района. Мавчуда имеет четверых детей. Ее дочери в возрасте 10 и 9 лет. Сыновьям 7 и 5 лет. Мавлюда как и большинство населения горной Республики Таджикистана занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Она занимается купля продажей скотин уже 5 лет. Она считает что набралась достаточного опыта, чтобы расширить небольшой бизнес.  Она просит кредит, чтобы купить скотин для откорма и продажи.
texts.en:
Mavjuda is a 34 years old resident of a small region. She has four children. Her daughters are 10 and 9 years old. Her sons are 7 and 5. 

Like the main part of the population of the Republic of Tajikistan, Mavjuda works with agriculture. She has worked with selling cattle for five years already. She thinks that she has gained enough experience to expand her small business. She requests a loan in order to purchase cattle to fatten and sell.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to fatten and resell

loans.name: Diala

texts.en:
Diala is a 35-year-old single woman and a souvenir craftswoman. She has been in the souvenir-making business for the last eight years, and her quality of work is known all around her neighborhood. The income she makes from her work has been able to provide her with most of what she needs, yet she lacks the capital to complete renovations on her house.

Thus Diala acquired a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua in order to pay some of her family’s house needs.

Today her acquired loan will be used to buy requested housewares. 

Diala hopes to open a small gallery to display and sell her crafts.

loans.use: to buy requested housewares

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru:
Вера занимается торговлей мужской обувью и женской одеждой. Она работает на выезде в разных районных центрах области — Ставище, Сквира, Брусилов. Этим бизнесом Вера занимается уже 19 лет, опыт работы у нее громадный. Товар Вера обычно хранит в сумках в собственном гараже. Торговые точки арендует на местах. Недавно супруг Веры перенес инсульт. Она продолжает выхаживать его, делая все возможное для его полного восстановления. 
Однако за суммой в 12 000 гривен Вера обратилась не в бизнес целях. Она уже некоторое время ведет ремонт в собственном доме и все время не хватало средств закончить его. Полученные от КИВА деньги будут вложены в облицовку фасада дома после его утепления. Этот ремонт крайне необходим уже давно, так как внутренняя стена очень сырая и на стенах может рано или поздно начать расти грибок, что очень вредно для здоровья всей семьи.
texts.en:
Vera works with selling men's shoes and women's clothing. She travels around in the different regional centers of the area, such as Stavische, Skvira and Brusilov. Vera has been in this business for 19 years already, and she has a vast experience with this work. Vera often stores the goods in bags in her garage. She rents sales stalls in different places. Not long ago, Vera's husband suffered a stroke. She continues to nurse him, doing everything possible for his full recovery. 

Vera did not ask for a loan of 12,000 hryvnia for business purposes. She has been repairing her home for some time already, but she never had enough money to finish the repairs. The money received from Kiva will be invested in paneling the facade of the house, after first insulating it. She has needed this repair badly for a long time, since the inner walls are moist and fungus will eventually start growing on them. This is very harmful for the health of the entire family.

loans.use: to insulate and panel the walls of her house

loans.name: Zulhumor

texts.ru: Зулхумор родилась в 1968 году. Она добрая и трудолюбивая женщина с отдаленного региона. Зулхумор вдова. Она мать троих сыновей. Зулхумор также воспитывает 2 внуков. Она более 20 лет занимается выращиванием сельхоз культур как картофель, пшеница и т.п. Зулхумор имеет большой опыт по выращиванию сельхоз культур. Также она имеет дополнительный доход от скотоводства. Зулхумор последнее время не получает достаточного дохода и поэтому нуждается поддержки своих детей. Ее второй сын не имеет место работы в Таджикистане и поэтому он собирается уехать в Российскую Федерацию и зарабатывать на жизнь. Зулхумор запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для своего сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Zulhumor was born in 1968. She is a good and hardworking woman from a remote region. Zulhumor is a widow. She is the mother of three sons. Zulhumor also raises two grandchildren. She has worked with growing field crops, such as potatoes, wheat etc, for more than 20 years. 

Zulhumor has experience in agriculture. She also has an additional income from livestock breeding. Lately, Zulhumor has not received sufficient income, and she needs to support her children. Her second son does not have any work in Tajikistand, and therefore he has decided to go to the Russian Federation to earn a living. Zulhumor requests a loan in the amount of 3,000 som (KGS) to purchase plane tickets for her son. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To purchase a plane ticket for her son

loans.name: Letty

texts.en:
Letty is a resident of Malibay, Pasay, Philippines. She is 53 years old and a mother to her loving and very supportive children. Life indeed is hard. But by the grace of God, she was able to raise her children well.

Letty owns a variety store. This is a small store that can be owned by anyone in the community and the store is just connected to or just inside their houses. This is where you can buy a sachet of shampoo or conditioner, a bar of soap, a Php5-worth of cooking oil, or an egg and other things. She gets her product from a wholesaler at a lower price, then she will sell it per piece for a higher price to have profit. Her regular customers are her neighbors, passerby and the people in the community. She earns Php 300 a day.

To be able to expand her inventory, she is requesting a Php 9,000. She will use the loan to buy groceries, toiletries and beverages to expand her product inventory. This loan will be a great help for her to add more products to her store.

Letty only desires to meet their everyday needs and hopes that she will have more products to sell and more customers to buy her items. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. Rosemarie has been in this business for five years; she earns more income from pig fattening and a general store.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she requested the additional loan to further build her business.

She is borrowing PHP 30,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business for her food vending business.

Rosemarie has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair his bicycle, purchase some baskets, and buy avocados to sell.

loans.name: Irish

texts.en:
Irish is 30 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Irish works very hard to provide for them.

Irish runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Irish has been in this business for three years, and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, eggs, noodles, bread, snack foods, cereals, sanitary pads, etc. 

In the future, Irish would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Monica Alejandra

texts.es:
Ella es Monica Alejandra, ella vivía en un pueblo con los hijos y la mama, una persona que se encuentra en silla de ruedas por diferentes enfermedades que tiene en este momento, la violencia lego al pueblo donde ellas Vivian y desde ese momento la vida se tornó demasiado difícil por tantos momentos difíciles que pasaron en ese tiempo, tanto así que el padre de ella falleció y la situación era más difícil.  
Ella fue víctima de desplazamiento forzado, de ahí toma la decisión de estudiar enfermería,  carrera que siempre había querido estudiar y se dio la oportunidad para iniciar, es madre cabeza de hogar de dos niños uno de 14 años y otro de 5, por eso ella quiere tener  el subsidio de kiva, para que le pueda ayudar y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This is Monica Alejandra. She used to live in a town with her kids and her mom. Right now, her mom is in a wheelchair due to different illnesses. Violence took over their town, and since that moment life turned too difficult for them. They went through hard times. Her father died and the situation became more complicated. 

She was forced to move away. That´s when she made the decision to get a nursing degree. She had always wanted to study this career, and she gave herself a chance to start it. She is head of household with two kids. One is 14 years old, and the other is 5. 

This is why she wants to be subsidized by Kiva, to get the help to improve the quality of her life

loans.use: to pay for the semester registration

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a new cupboard for the house

loans.name: Kukuli Group

texts.es:
Un grupo de amigos y vecinos formaron el banco comunal “Kukuli” de la UMF Asociación Arariwa. El banco comunal tiene 24 ciclos de funcionamiento (Cada ciclo son 4 meses) y el banco comunal está bien administrado por la junta directiva.

Rita nació en la ciudad de Cusco, ella tiene 38 años, es casada y fruto de esta unión tiene cuatro hijos. Rita es una madre de familia que vive con sus hijos en su casa propia que cuenta con todos los servicios básicos (agua, luz y desagüe) en la ciudad del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad comercial y el turismo. Rita es ama de casa y alterna sus actividades de su casa con la elaboración de artesanía, ella junto con su esposo tienen un taller de pintura en su domicilio. Ya son 15 años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que ponen en su trabajo. Rita solicitado Rita a Asociación Arariwa un crédito para adquirir materiales como por ejemplo marcos cubiertos con pan de oro, bastidores, oleos y marcos de solo madera. Con los ingresos de la venta de sus productos cubriría las cuotas del crédito brindado. Rita es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro a sus hijos mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia. Rita tiene como sueño abrir una tienda de ventas en el centro de la ciudad del Cusco.(las personas que aparecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron después de la reunión).
texts.en:
The communal bank Kukuli, from UMF Asociación Arariwa, was founded by a group of friends and neighbors. This communal bank has been in operation for 24 cycles (each cycle is four months) and is well administrated by its governing board.

Rita was born in the city of Cusco. She is 38 years old and married, and has four children from her marriage. Rita lives with her children in her own home, which is connected to all the basic utilities (water, electricity, and sewer) in the city and department of Cusco. This area is known for its trade business and tourism. Rita is a homemaker, but she alternates housework with craftmaking. She and her husband have a painting studio at home. They have been in this business for fifteen years already and it is going very well for them thanks to the dedication they put into their work. 

Rita is requesting a loan from Asociación Arariwa to buy materials, such as gold leaf frames, plain wood frames, canvas stretchers, and oil paint. She will cover the loan payments with the income obtained from selling her products. Rita is very well known for being a hardworking and responsible woman and a good mother who wants to give her children a better future and improve her family's quality of life. Rita's dream is to open a store in downtown Cusco.

(The individuals shown in the bottom of the photo arrived after the meeting).

loans.use: to buy gold leaf frames, plain wood frames, canvas stretchers, and oil paint.

loans.name: María Perfecta

texts.es:
María de 41 años de edad, es una mujer la cual en su vida a luchado contra todo y siempre manifiesta ha salido adelante con la bendición de Dios pero siempre hay sucesos en la vida que  marcan y dejan huella y son recuerdos que no se borran de la mente, comenta María. 


Ella se encarga de realizar los oficios domésticos en su casa y cuidar a sus  hijos y luchar cada día junto a su esposo para crecer a sus hijos. Ella también elabora antojitos para salir a vender ambulantemente para ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. Su esposo  le apoya siempre en la lucha diaria por continuar en la vida ya que expresa “de la muerte somos y no hay nada que se pueda hacer para revertir el ciclo interminable de la vida, como rio que vaga por la tierra y que inevitablemente ha de volver al inmenso mar”. 


El préstamo se empleara para los gastos funerarios de su abuela,  ya que gracias al apoyo de la institución  lograran solventar esta difícil situación consolándose en que descansara en paz, ya que ha sufrido mucho por su enfermedad.

Espera seguir luchando con la vida y sobre todo superar este dolor que le dejaría la perdida de su querida abuela,  ya que es un vació que no se puede llenar, perder a un ser querido.
texts.en:
María is 41 years old. She is a woman who has fought against everything in her life, and has always managed to make it through with God's help, she says. But in life there are always events that scar you or leave their mark, memories that can't be erased from the mind, says María. 

She is a homemaker, so she takes care of housework at home and tends to her children. She works hard every day alongside her husband in order to raise them. She also makes food that she sells on the street in order to help her husband with their household expenses. Her husband always supports her in the daily struggles of life, since she says, "We belong to death and there is nothing one can do to revert life's endless cycle. Life is like a river that wanders through the earth and that inevitably must return to the vast sea”. 

She will use this loan to pay for her grandmother's funeral expenses. This help will allow her to overcome this difficult situation and find solace in the fact that she rests in peace, since she suffered a lot from her illness.

She hopes to keep up the fight in life and, above all, overcome the pain from the loss of her dear grandmother, because losing a loved one is a void that cannot be filled.

loans.use: to pay for her grandmother's funeral expenses.

loans.name: Sandra Carolina

texts.es: Sandra tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y su pequeño hijo de dos años de edad. Sandra y su familia habita en condiciones muy humildes y se gana la vida por medio de la prestación de servicios domésticos desde hace 6 años y junto a su esposo mantienen la economía de su hogar. Sandra solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la introducción del servicio de agua potable dado que en la actualidad no cuenta con el servicio. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder pagar por la introducción del vital líquido.
texts.en: Sandra is 21 years old and lives in her own home with her husband and two year old son.  Sandra and her family live under humble conditions and she earns a living providing domestic services and has been doing so for six years.  She and her husband support their household.  Sandra is asking for this loan, through FUSAI, to have potable water service installed because she doesn’t have running water.  She hopes to get this loan and be able to pay for service for this vital liquid.

loans.use: to install running water.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente de 28 años de edad vive con su esposa y su hija, el se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el cliente esta solicitando a INTEGRAL un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar los insumos necesarios para la siembra como: fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y mejorar el terreno donde desea hacer el cultivo que es el que muestra la fotografía, y asi poder seguir con su trabajo y darle a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: He is 28 years old and lives with his wife and daughter.  He raises corn and beans and sells his products in the different markets near his home and supports his household this way.  He is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL to buy supplies such as fertilizer, compost, insect control, etc. and to improve his farmland, shown in the photo.  In this way he can continue working and provide for his family’s needs without limit.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: José Alejandro

texts.es:
José de 34 años de edad, es un joven luchador motorista de profesión desde los 18 años de edad, el cual trabaja con su pick up transportando carga de un pueblo a otro; su madre ya falleció y su padre también, pero la casa de habitación de ellos es ahora el hogar de  José y su hermano,  el cual vive con su esposa junto a él en casas diferentes.  
 
José manifiesta que le encanta su trabajo y pues haciendo esto es como él se divierte, cometa “El que sabe se divierte” y se sonreía mientras nos contaba su historias de sus viajes y hazañas, también comenta “ que muchos fracasan en las carreteras por no tener precaución a la hora de manejar así que yo tengo mi precaución a la hora que manejo si no ya fuera difunto como muchos,” 


El préstamo se empleara para la reparación de Pick Up que necesita un chequeo y por ello quiere el financiamiento para que su herramienta de trabajo le quede en buenas condiciones y listo para trabajar.


Pretende a futuro vender este carro que tiene y comprar otro mejor para trabajar con mas ganas, ya que el que actualmente posee no es 4x4 y en terrenos escabrosos se le dificulta un poco el acceso.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old. He is a young man who is a fighter. He is 18 and he is a driver by profession. He works with his pick up transporting cargo from one town to another. His mother and his father already passed away, but their home is José's and his brother's now. He lives there with his wife in a separate house from his brother.   
 
José says that he loves his job and doing it is how he has fun. He says: “if you know how, you have fun", and he smiles while he tells us his stories about his trips and his achievements. He also says that " a lot of people fail on the roads because they aren't careful when they drive. That is why I am careful when I drive. If not, I'd be dead, like a lot of people"


He will use the loan to repair his pick-up. It needs to be checked and that is why he wants the loan so that his work tool will be in good condition and ready for work. 

In the future, he intends on selling this car that he has and buying a better one to work with more enthusiasm. The one he has now doesn't have four wheel drive and on rough terrain it is difficult to gain access.

loans.use: to repair a pick up that needs to be checked. That is why needs the loan so that his work tool can be kept in good condition and ready for work.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet metal, wood, and nails to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Claudia Maricela

texts.es: Claudia tiene 19 años de edad y habita junto a su grupo familiar. Ella se dedica a la venta de leche dado que cuanta con tres vacas lecheras las cuales con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado comprar y son las que le permiten percibir ingresos y colaborar con la economía del hogar. Claudia solicita este crédito a FUSAI dado que desea reparar el techo de la vivienda el cual se encuentra deteriorado y desea cambiarlo antes que el invierno llegue.
